tmp_item_id_0.name: hoe
tmp_item_id_0.script:
#if ?{@facing}@soil != true, INVALID
#replace target: @facing, slug: tmp_tt_id_4
You drive a furrow into the soil
#end
:INVALID
You can't till that

tmp_item_id_1.name: Wheat Seed
tmp_item_id_1.script:
#if ! ?{@facing}@plantable, waste
This looks like good, fertile soil to nurture the seed
#replace target: @facing, slug: tmp_tt_id_6
#end
:waste
You cast the seed upon the barren ground

tmp_item_id_2.name: Sicle
tmp_item_id_2.script:
#if ?{@facing}@harvestable, harvest
#take health, 1, @facing
The sicle goes swish
#sound tmp_sound_id_1
#end
:harvest
#send harvest, @facing
#sound tmp_sound_id_0
tmp_item_id_2.description: A small sharp tool for harvesting

tmp_item_id_3.name: Corn Seed
tmp_item_id_3.script:
#if ! ?{@facing}@plantable, waste
This looks like good, fertile soil to nurture the seed
#replace target: @facing, slug: tmp_tt_id_9
#end
:waste
You cast the seed upon the barren ground

tmp_item_id_4.name: Bread
tmp_item_id_4.description: Corn, Wheat, Multigrain, its all the same

tmp_item_id_5.name: Bread Maker
tmp_item_id_5.script:
#if ?{@facing}@countertop != true, INVALID
#replace target: @facing, slug: tmp_tt_id_11
#unequip tmp_item_id_5, ?self
You install the breadmaker
#end
:INVALID
Thats not a good place for this

tmp_item_id_6.name: Axe
tmp_item_id_6.script:
#if ?{@facing}@choppable, chop
#take health, 1, @facing
The axe cuts air
#sound tmp_sound_id_1
#end
:chop
#send chop, @facing
#sound tmp_sound_id_0

#.name: sicle
#.script:
#end
:touch
#if ! ?sender@player, done
You pick up the sicle
#equip tmp_item_id_2, ?sender
#die
:done

<.name: Stump
<.script:
#end
:touch
This stump seems like it still has some useful wood
#end
:chop
choppin wood
#random wood, 1-3
#give wood, @wood, ?sender
You managed to havest ${ @wood } wood
#zap touch
#zap chop
#become character: ., blocking: false, choppable: false
#send respawn, self, 60
#end
:respawn
#restore touch
#restore chop
#become character: π, blocking: true, choppable: true
#end

@.name: Bag of wheat seed
@.script:
#end
:touch
#if ! ?sender@player, done
You pick up the wheat seeds
#equip tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#equip tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#equip tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#equip tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#equip tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#die
:done

V.name: Counter
V.script:
#end
:touch
This looks like a good place
to put something.

].name: Smith
].script:
#end
:touch
#if ?sender@bought_breadmaker, has_breadmaker
Would you like to buy this breadmaker for $20?

!buy_breadmaker; Yes
!no; No
#end
:buy_breadmaker
#take cash, 20, ?sender, too_poor
#equip tmp_item_id_5, ?sender
?sender@bought_breadmaker = true
#end
:has_breadmaker
Nothing new for you today.
Maybe next time.
#end
:too_poor
You can't afford it!
Come back when you have more cash.
:no

i.name: Floor
i.script:
#end
:touch
The gates to town are closed.
Maybe they will be opened later.

l.name: Fountain of Knowledge
l.script:
#end
:touch
I am the fountian of knowledge
Of what topic do you seek enlightenment?
!farming;Farming
!banking;Banking
!tools;Smithing

!score;Myself
#end
:farming
Of this there is much to tell.
Till the soil, so plants may grow.
Harvest with a sicle.
Don't wait to long, or to dust they'll go.

Wheat, can be harvested in 3 minutes,
but more than 10 is too long.
Same for corn, but stays fresh for 10 more.

(there are other cultivars, but those haven't
been implimented yet)
#end
:banking
The banker is always out to lunch.
Maybe he will come back one day.
#end
:tools
You'll need tools, more than just your sicle
and trusty hoe. But not quite yet.
#end
:score
You have taken ${ ?sender@steps } steps.

You have harvested
${ ?sender@hwheat } wheat
${ ?sender@hcorn } corn

Maybe one day I'll tell you more secrets you don't
already know.
#end
l.animate_colors: red, orange, yellow, cyan, magenta, white, chartreuse

n.name: Banker
n.script:
#END
:TOUCH
The banker is out to lunch,
come back later

#!.name: Bag of Corn Seed
#!.script:
#end
:touch
#if ! ?sender@player, done
You pick up the corn seeds
#equip tmp_item_id_3, ?sender
#equip tmp_item_id_3, ?sender
#equip tmp_item_id_3, ?sender
#equip tmp_item_id_3, ?sender
#equip tmp_item_id_3, ?sender
#die
:done

##.name: Grocer
##.script:
#END
:TOUCH
@wc = 0
@wc += ?sender@wheat
@cc = 0
@cc += ?sender@corn

Welcome to the grocer.
I see you have ${ @wc } wheat.
I see you have ${ @cc } corn.

!SELL_ALL_WHEAT;Sell ${ @wc } Wheat for $${ @wc }
!SELL_ALL_CORN;Sell ${ @cc } Corn for $${ @cc }
!BUY_WHEAT_SEED;Buy 5 Wheat Seed for $3
!BUY_CORN_SEED;Buy 3 Corn Seed for $2
!DONE;Leave
#END
:SELL_ALL_WHEAT
@count = ?sender@wheat
#TAKE wheat, @count, ?sender, NO_SALE
#GIVE cash, @count, ?sender
#END
:SELL_ALL_CORN
@count = ?sender@corn
#TAKE corn, @count, ?sender, NO_SALE
#GIVE cash, @count, ?sender
#END
:BUY_WHEAT_SEED
#TAKE cash, 3, ?sender, TOO_POOR
#EQUIP tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#EQUIP tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#EQUIP tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#EQUIP tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#EQUIP tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#END
:BUY_CORN_SEED
#TAKE cash, 2, ?sender, TOO_POOR
#EQUIP tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#EQUIP tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#EQUIP tmp_item_id_1, ?sender
#END
:NO_SALE
You can't sell what you don't have
#END
:TOO_POOR
Insufficient funds
#END
:DONE

dungeon.name: Chore Simulator
dungeon.description: Who doesn't enjoy a nice zen chore simulation game where the only goal is to do repetative tasks

tmp_tt_id_6.name: Wheat planting
tmp_tt_id_6.script:
#send grow_sprout, self, 60
#send grow_bigger, self, 120
#send grow_harvest, self, 180
#send grow_rot, self, 600
#end
:touch
This soil has been planted with wheat
#end
:touch
The sprout pushes through the soil
#end
:touch
The wheat grows tall, soon ready for harvest
#end
:touch
Grab your sicle, its harvest time
#end
:touch
This plant has decayed and turns to dust
#become slug: tmp_tt_id_4
#end
:grow_sprout
#become character: ,, color: #0F0
#zap touch
#end
:grow_bigger
#become character: Ψ
#zap touch
#end
:grow_harvest
#become color: #FF0
@harvestable=true
#zap touch
#end
:grow_rot
#become color: #AAA
#zap harvest
#zap touch
#end
:harvest
#if not @harvestable, done
#give wheat, 1, ?sender
#give hwheat, 1, ?sender
#become slug: tmp_tt_id_4
#end
:harvest
#become slug: tmp_tt_id_4
:done

#end

#equip tmp_item_id_1, ?sender

:done

#send grow_rot, self, 1200
#end

#end
:touch
The corn grows tall, soon ready for harvest
#end
:touch
Grab your sicle, its harvest time
#end
:touch
This plant has decayed and turns to dust
#become slug: tmp_tt_id_4
#end
:grow_sprout
#become character: ɾ, color: #0F0
#zap touch
#end
:grow_bigger
#become character: ϒ
#zap touch
#end
:grow_harvest
#become color: #FF0
@harvestable=true
#zap touch
#end
:grow_rot
#become color: #AAA
#zap harvest
#zap touch
#end
:harvest
#if not @harvestable, done

#give hcorn, 1, ?sender
#become slug: tmp_tt_id_4
#end
:harvest
#become slug: tmp_tt_id_4
:done

tmp_tt_id_11.name: Bread Maker
tmp_tt_id_11.script:
#end
:touch
#if @bread_ready, COLLECT_BREAD
You have the following ingredients:
corn:  ${ ?sender@corn }
wheat: ${ ?sender@wheat }

!WHEAT_BREAD;Make wheat bread for 5 wheat
!CORN_BREAD;Make corn bread for 3 corn
!MULTIGRAIN;Make multigrain bread for 2 wheat, 2 corn

!NONE;Do nothing
#end
:WHEAT_BREAD
#take wheat, 5, ?sender, LACK_INGREDIENTS
#send START_BAKING
#end
:CORN_BREAD
#take corn, 3, ?sender, LACK_INGREDIENTS
#send START_BAKING
#end
:MULTIGRAIN
#if ?sender@wheat < 2, LACK_INGREDIENTS
#if ?sender@corn < 2, LACK_INGREDIENTS
#take wheat, 2, ?sender
#take corn, 2, ?sender
#send START_BAKING
#end
:LACK_INGREDIENTS
You don't have the ingredients
#end
:START_BAKING
#zap touch
#send DONE_BAKING, self, 60
:BAKING
#sequence bc, #F5DEB3, #C19A6B, #954535, #D27D2D
#become background_color: @bc
#sound tmp_sound_id_2
?i
#if !@bread_ready
#send BAKING
#end
:DONE_BAKING
?i
#become background_color: gold
#sound tmp_sound_id_3
@bread_ready = true
#restore touch
#end
:COLLECT_BREAD
#equip tmp_item_id_4, ?sender
@bread_ready = false
#become background_color: #CD7F32
Mmm, fresh bread
#end
:touch
Breadmaker is still working...
#send BAKING
#end
:NONE

tmp_tt_id_12.description: Once a towering tree, now a humble stump
